experience.description: Greatest achievements  Transformed the Design team (4 designers, including myself) into a respected and reliable partner in the software development lifecycle (SDLC), and also increased designer output, skill, and engagement in the process. We went from being the team where "they'll deliver it when it's done, no timeline" (Mar 2022), to shipping great designs for 9 medium to major projects - 3 early, and 6 on time as planned (Dec 2022). This includes 2 major projects for our new UK markets.  Delivered Compass Design System (CDS) version 2 in collaboration with our design systems front-end developer lead, as well as sponsoring and mentoring a junior report who has talent and interest in design systems. Like most design systems, CDS v2 is an ongoing project. Since embarking on v2 in June 2022, Compass has released UI uplifts to 8 different areas as of December 2022, with more planned in the works for 2023. CDS v2 has been a hit with developers and our own design team, allowing us to ship better work at least 3 times faster than when we started in June 2022. Core responsibilities (Design Lead)  Team leadership: Mentoring, sponsoring, career progression design (career ladders, skill & talent trees), evangelising for Design and design team across Compass  Design systems: Collaboration with front-end software lead to create, enhance, and maintain Compass Design System version 2  Project management: SCRUM mastery, stakeholder & roadmap management Core responsibilities (Individual contributor) Compass is at the stage where it still needs "doer-managers", so I split my time between People Management and Individual Contributor (IC) work.
